DOC.brief_summary: The new generation ZES ( Medtronic , Minneapolis , MN , Resolute Integrity ) EES ( Abbott Vascular , Abbott Park , Illinois , Xience Prime ) introduce South Korea . Although thought superior effect stability compare ZES EES previous generation , clinical data regard high risk group diabetes patient small vessel lesion . Moreover , look 8.3 % restenosis Resolute All Comer study ( 23 % diabetes ) , investigator could know outcome high risk patient diabetes small vessel lesion . Therefore , aim study investigate effectiveness safety Resolute Integrity Xience Prime diabetes small vessel lesion patient .
DOC.brief_title: COmparison Xience PrimE Versus REsolute Integrity Diabetes Small Vessel Disease
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age > 18 year 2 . Patients require stent procedure ( visual diameter stenosis â‰¥ 50 % ) 3 . Stable angina evidence myocardial ischemia , acute coronary syndrome ( ST segment elevation , nonST segment elevation acute myocardial infarction , unstable angina ) 4 . Patients diagnose type 2 diabetes small vessel disease 5 . Patients willing participate study write consent 1 . Those hypersensitive abstain heparin , aspirin , clopidogrel , contrast medium , zotarolimus , everolimus . 2 . Pregnant woman future plan pregnancy . 3 . Those hemorrhagic disease bloodclotting disorder ( include heparininduced thrombocytopenia ) , reject blood transfusion . 4 . Those medical history digestive urinary system bleed last 3 month , receive major surgery within 2 month . 5 . Those thrombocytopenia ( < 100,000/mm3 ) hemoglobin 10.0 g/dL less . 6 . Those plan surgery require discontinuation antiplatelet drug within next 12 month ( especially , thienopyridines type ) . 7 . When remain survival period expect less 1 year . 8 . Restenosis lesion 9 . Left main coronary artery lesion 10 . Saphenous vein graft stenosis lesion 11 . Left ventricular ejection fraction < 30 % 12 . Cardiac shock 13 . Those liver function failure : When liver enzyme level ( ALT ) 3 time normal upper limit . 14 . Type I diabetes
